hashcol

The hashcol module is accessible via the sqlobject.include module.

  • Attributes (1)
  • Functions
  • Classes (1)
  • Modules
  • Index
  • Source

Attributes

a __package__

'sqlobject.include'

Classes

C HashCol(...) ...

End-user HashCol class. May be instantiated with 'hashMethod', a function which returns the string hash of any other string (i.e. basestring).

This class contains 6 members.

See the source for more information.
